items.title: Trump tariffs live updates: Stellantis to temporarily layoff 900 US employees
items.description: Fallout continues after President Donald Trump's unveiling of severe tariffs against virtually all U.S. trading partners.

items.title: What to know about Smoot-Hawley tariffs and their role in the Great Depression
items.description: The measure helped worsen the Great Depression, experts said.

items.title: Amazon joins bidding war for TikTok as deadline for sale approaches: Sources
items.description: Amazon has now sent a letter to the Trump administration to join the bidding war for TikTok, sources told ABC News.

items.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
items.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

items.title: WATCH:  7 tigers seized from homeowner with links to ‘Tiger King’
items.description: Seven tigers have been seized from the Nevada home of exotic animal dealer Karl Mitchell, who has ties to the notorious "Tiger King" Joe Exotic.
